WorkItem.Description:
I tried to edit the ring enchant in the 2.3.3 version of Rawr, but every time I go and try to open that character file, I get an error. Also, rogues are showing DW trinket at 45-50% proc rate and the ring being a 1ppm 60sec ICD if you want to update that in Rawr.
 
See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.

Comments.Message: I can't reproduce this. Can you provide more steps as to what you do to get it to crash?

I went in to edit the ring proc from 45 seconds to 60 seconds ICD and the proc rate from 100% (default of 2.3.3) to 10% at the same time. It crashed and asked me if I wanted to save the character file, I said yes. Now every time I open a character file that uses that ring, Rawr crashes. I had a similar issue when I tried to edit the proc on Deathbringer's Will using an old Item Cache since I had manually added most of the socket bonuses to the ICC gear and didn't want to do it again.

It seems to be whenever I edit more than 1 thing when in the proc editor. I just had it happen when I tried to roughly model the new T10 feral idol. It also happened previously when I was editting the Deathbringer's Will trinket.

2.3.3 is really unhappy about editing/adding new proc effects. Here's what I did last night to crash it while editting the feral T10 idol.
I clicked edit item.
Add proc.
Hit ok as earlier testing showed Rawr not liking multiple values being edited at once.
Entered a value of 44 agility and hit ok again due to issue stated above.
Rawr crashes immediately.
